pos review: It was ok but could be improved to match the 4 star rating.  Outdoor entrance and lobby interior appears kind  "gloomy"and  on the "" dark side"". Furniture has seen better days..  a more lively ristailing would help
Location, staff in general. Have been before, hence the reason to come back.
neg review:
Bar not open at lunch time. No food available at lunch time. Excuse given, its a holiday here!!!
My view is you are a hotel, we come here for a break or holiday.
No toilet brush in room. No extracter fan in bathroom.

pos review: The hotel is very central and convenient, in a nice part of Antwerp. The room was generous, the bathroom roomy. There was lots of choice for breakfast.
neg review: The toilet was small, no extraction fan.

pos review: sleeping room really, street really quiet during the night. Unfortunatelly the air conditioning is old and noisy.
neg review: Location is perfect, quiet, central, near museims and good restaurants. The meir was about 5 min. per feet.

pos review: The location could not have been better, and the staff were fantastic.
neg review: The hotel needs updating as the decor was fairly dated and small details need a touch-up.

pos review: Good bed, good breakfast, good location, nice room. nice bathroom!
